mapper.select: SELECT c.parent_id as parentId, p.category_id as categoryId, c.name as categoryName, p.id, p.product_name as productName, p.description as description, p.content as content, p.price as price, p.delete_flag as deleteFlag, p.create_date as createDate, p.modify_date as modifyDate, pi.id as pi_id, pi.delet_flag as pi_delete_flag, fi.id as file_id, fi.file_name as fileName FROM product p INNER JOIN category c on p.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN product_image pi on p.id = pi.product_id INNER JOIN file_info fi on pi.file_id = fi.id where p.category_id = #{keyword};
SELECT delete_flag FROM product where id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (category_id, product_name, price, description, content) VALUES (#{category_id},#{productName},#{price},#{description},#{content})
INSERT INTO file_info (file_name, save_file_name, content_type) values (#{fileName},#{saveFileName},#{contentType})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET delete_flag = '1', modify_date = now() WHERE id = #{productId}
UPDATE product SET price = #{modifyPrice}, modify_date = now() WHERE id = #{productId}
